original_text: Be very careful! Do not let anyone use their riches to deceive you. Do not let them pay you a lot of money to do something that is wrong. Be very careful!
korean_text: 그대는 분노하지 않도록 조심하며 많은 뇌물이 그대를 그릇된 길로 가게 할까 조심하라

sentences.original_text: Do not let anyone use their riches to deceive you.
sentences.korean_translation: 누구도 그들의 부로 당신을 속이게 하지 마라.

sentences.original_text: Do not let them pay you a lot of money
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 당신에게 많은 돈을 주게 하지 마라

sentences.original_text: to do something that is wrong.
